content.description: Register for a two day exploration of full stack cloud development with AWS Amplify, a set of tools and services to build secure, scalable cloud-powered mobile and web applications.
In this talk, you'll learn about DynamoDB and secondary indexes. Then, we'll walk through some strategies for using secondary indexes effectively in DynamoDB.

content.event: Creating a Serverless App Without Writing Any Code: Azure Logic Apps
content.description: What if we could create a serverless app without needing to write any code? In this session we’ll explore Azure Logic Apps and learn how to create serverless workflows without needing to write code!

content.event: Cloud Run: Overcoming the challenges of building & deploying Serverless apps
content.description: What would an application built on top of Cloud Run look like? Two demos will guide us through the building and deploying of an application to Cloud Run.
In this session, you will learn more about EventBridge, a serverless event bus service that makes it easy to connect your applications with data from a variety of event sources.
content.organizer: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

content.description: Get hands-on experience with AWS and serverless applications in this workshop. You'll deploy a simple web application that enables users to vote for their favorite options for a set of questions.
In this session, we will see what all things Amazon Cognito can do and how to integrate the service into your existing or serverless application.

content.event: Java and AWS Lambda in 2020 - Cold Starts and More
content.description: AWS Lambda + Java is ready for the enterprise - Mike Roberts will tell you why!
AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway, MySQL, PHP - it’s LAMP but not as you know it. In this session, Ben Smith will show why there has never been a better time to build serverless applications with PHP.

Once we have a running serverless application, even if it's running well, it can feel like a black box. Nica will discuss strategies to get useful, actionable information out of your serverless stack.

content.event: FaaS by Microsoft: Azure Functions and Azure Durable Functions
content.description: In this talk, Christian Lechner will show you what Microsoft brings to the table offering Azure Functions. In addition, we will take a look at an extension of these functions, namely Durable Functions

content.event: Predicting and Managing Costs in Serverless Applications
content.description: In this tech talk, we provide insight into how serverless application costs are calculated, and how you can optimize application design to minimize that cost.

content.event: Hello, World! Create REST APIs For CRUD Operations Using API Connect
content.description: Join IBM Developer for a hands-on workshop where you will create REST APIs for CRUD operations using IBM API Connect.

content.event: Quarkus dan Serverless Untuk Developer Java
content.description: Aplikasi monolitik selama ini telah menjadi standar de facto sampai munculnya arsitektur modern terbaru seperti microservices (termasuk microservices reaktif dan arsitektur event-driven) dan serverles
Second edition of ServerlessDays Virtual with a busload of great speakers and talks.

content.event: Orchestrating Distributed Business Workflows with AWS Step Functions
content.description: In this session, Rob Sutter will cover what’s new with Step Functions in 2020 and highlight the key patterns for building distributed business workflows to handle scale and workflow sophistication.
Yan Cui, AWS Serverless Hero, will talk about why Serverless is a super-power for FrontEnd focused teams.
For our next and in-person meetup, we are having not only one but two exciting serverless talks - Firecracker and Webslice
In this session Gunnar Grosch will dive head first into the world of robustness, reliability and resilience to examine some of the patterns and practices we use to build serverless applications.
ServerlessDays Warsaw is a 1-day conference about Serverless technologies with a full day of talks.
We are combining the 2020 ANZ serverless community events under the ServerlessDays ANZ banner and host speakers from the Serverless community right around the world.
content.organizer: ServerlessDays Sydney, Melbourne, Perth and Auckland

content.description: ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.
We bring together the world’s leading software architects and cloud experts to share their ideas and knowledge.
